module.name: chirdlutilbackports
module.author: Tammy Dugan
module.description: Contains data model extensions of openmrs used by CHIRDL (Child Health Improvement Research and Development Lab)

globalProperty.description: The location of the cache configuration file.
The default heap size (in # of entries) of a cache created outside the Ehcache XML configuration file.
The default expiry time (in minutes) of a cache created outside the Ehcache XML configuration file.

module.mappingFiles: location_tag_attribute.hbm.xml location_tag_attribute_value.hbm.xml chirdl_location_attribute.hbm.xml chirdl_location_attribute_value.hbm.xml form_instance.hbm.xml form_attribute.hbm.xml form_attribute_value.hbm.xml session.hbm.xml state_mapping.hbm.xml state_action.hbm.xml state.hbm.xml patient_state.hbm.xml program.hbm.xml error_category.hbm.xml error.hbm.xml program_tag_map.hbm.xml obs_attribute_value.hbm.xml obs_attribute.hbm.xml form_instance_attribute_value.hbm.xml form_instance_attribute.hbm.xml encounter_attribute_value.hbm.xml encounter_attribute.hbm.xml
